ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Lame List of New Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Solon...Song of the Sirens...maybe an invis to undead song? I do like his post though (maybe GZ is a bard at heart? :) --Khelan ... Anyone check out
ygData.messageBody:
Solon...Song of the Sirens...maybe an invis to undead song?

I do like his post though (maybe GZ is a bard at heart? :)

--Khelan

>>> Daniel P. Sniderman<fuzzbone@...> 04/16/00 12:12PM >>>
Anyone check out http://everquest.station.sony.com/p_archmage.html

Now - I hate to go on another rant - and I guess GZ is trying to be "cute"
but every class gets a detailed description of their new spells - while
bards essentially get the new song's names... Some of them you can
certainly figure out what he means - like "Attack Speed verses from Vilia "
but others like "A few notes from Solon " gives us little to no information.
